{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = Iris Smart Hub (IH300) |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Iris |model = Smart Hub |submodelappend = yes |submodel = (IH300) |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = smart home hub |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = 2AMI2IH300 |icid = 22853-IH300 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Freescale (NXP);i.MX6UL;MCIMX6U5DVM10AC; |cpu1_cores = 2<!-- 1 --> |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A7 |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz <!-- 900 / 696 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = Serial(SPI) |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Toshiba;THGBMDG5D1LBAIL; |flash1size = 4 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Adesto Tech;AT45DB041E; |flash2size = 512 KiB |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3L |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Micron;MT41K256M16TW-107; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Atheros;AR8031; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 6-pin header,, unpopulated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1),, J9 |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Bluetooth 5.0, ZigBee, Z-Wave, RTC w/ battery, battery backup, speaker |addchip = 2.5GHz/915 MHz Dual Band 19.5 dBm Radio Board;Silicon Labs;EFR32MG;;1;,,, Z-Wave Wireless SIP;Silicon Labs;ZM5101;;1;,,, Mono Audio Codec w/2-wire Interface Control;Nuvoton;NAU88C10;;1;,,, CMOS Real Time Clock;NXP;PCF8563;;1;,,, 3.3V Low Power Microprocessor Supervisory Circuit;Exar Corp;SP706R;;1;,,, PWM-Embedded 3x4-Channel Constant-Current Sink Driver;Macroblock Inc;MBI6023;;3;,,, 13.56MHz Multi-Protocol Contactless Transceiver IC w/SPI and UART Serial Access;STMicroclectronics;CR95HF;;1;,,, |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = root |defaultpass = zm<!-- zm\{\[*f6gB5X($\]R9 --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 820909655244 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = AzureWave AW-NM288SM |rad1modif = SDIO 2.0 |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Cypress;CYW43362; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2mod = RFStar IS-BM-ND05 |rad2modif = <!-- Radio Module Interface Type, Leave blank for none --> |wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Nordic;nRF52840; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = PCB on-board |rad2stand = Bluetooth
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Freescale (NXP)]]'' MCIMX6U5DVM10AC *Memory: 1024MB (SDRAM) DDR3L *Storage: 512KB SPI Serial Flash, 4GB eMMC 5.0 *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet port *WiFi: 802.11bgn Cypress CYW43362 :ZigBee Silicon Labs EFR32MG :Bluetooth 5.0 ''[[Nordic]]'' nRF52840 :Z-Wave Silicon Labs XM5101 *USB: 1x USB 2.0 Host *Power Source: 12V 1.5A via barrel
==Links of Interest== *[https://github.com/arcus-smart-home/arcushubos ''OS Source'' on '''GitHub''' ]
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery caption="RayKnight's Unit" mode="slideshow"> File:Iris IH300 Top.jpeg|Main Board Top File:Iris IH300 Bottom.jpeg|Main Board Bottom File:Iris IH300 LED Top.jpeg|LED Board Top File:Iris IH300 LED Bottom.jpeg|LED Board Bottom File:Iris IH300 Interface Top.jpeg|Interface Board Top File:Iris IH300 interface Bottom.jpeg|Interface Board Bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]] <center> <gallery caption="Srm45's Unit"> File:Iris IH300 - 01 - Box Front.jpg|Box Front File:Iris IH300 - 02 - Box Back.jpg|Box Back File:Iris IH300 - 03 - Box Top.jpg|Box Top File:Iris IH300 - 04 - Box Bottom.jpg|Box Bottom File:Iris IH300 - 05 - Inner Box.jpg|Inner Box File:Iris IH300 - 06 - Box Paperwork.jpg|Box w/ Paperwork on Top File:Iris IH300 - 07 - Box Inside.jpg|Box w/ Hub and Accessories File:Iris IH300 - 08 - Hub with Accessories.jpg|Hub w/ Accessories File:Iris IH300 - 09 - Power Adapter.jpg|Power Adapter File:Iris IH300 - 10 - Hub Bottom.jpg|Hub Bottom File:Iris IH300 - 11 - Hub Ports Closeup.jpg|Hub Ports Closeup </gallery></center>[[Has images::external| ]]
